sub_title: Senior Business Process Consultant @ FrieslandCampina - Process Transformation Office - Make and Quality
summary:
I am a result-oriented technical specialist and doer who has built up a successful track record as continuous improver and quality control engineer in the automotive paint and coatings industry.
My passion and drive is to bring people and organizations to a higher level in the areas:
•	Quality Assurance, 
•	Quality Management, 
•	Quality Control and 
•	SAP QM 
I will ensure lasting results through dedicated projects or programs and/or coaching.

My motto: "When you're out of quality, you're out of business." ~ Phil Crosby

By means of analyses I set up well-structured approaches and a transparent improvement plans for improvement. Engaging people and sharing knowledge are crucial success factors for Hans. With energy, persuasiveness, integrity and trust, I know how to motivate people to realize the goals in the programs and plans.

Request a connection for contact.

treasury_media.title: DMAIC.jpg
treasury_media.description: Define, Measure, Analyse, Improve and Control

profile_positions.description:
Experiences
•	QC BlueBook coordinator - Global alignment of QC procedures, methods and reports and coaching/monitoring progress Right First Time program
•	Color and non-color QC support/expert
•	Super key-user and Global Admin for OneSAP QM - First line contact
•	Developed and introduced BI Statistical Quality Control reports (In control Analyses)
•	Participated in Fit-Gap QM process analyses for manufacturing sites in Lancaster (US), Offenbach    (DL), DonGuan (CN), Hanoi (VN), JinYoung, Ansan (Ko)
•	Roll-out OneShading tool to color mixing sites
•	Project leader Color QC automation
•	PCMS color measurement and adjustment tool key user - First line contact
Achievements
•	Contributed to a stable, aligned and efficient OneSAP QM system
•	Developed a global use BI report for Statistical Quality Control
•	Developed a global use of Cost of Quality report
•	Developed a global use of monthly Right First Time (RFT) report
•	Introduced OneShading tool in Sassenheim color mixing facility
•	Organized RFT WorkShop in December 2015. As chairman I initiated RFT program for participating manufacturing sites.
•	Coordinated QC BlueBook Telcon’s. These monthly meetings focused on coaching/ monitoring RFT challenges and QM alignment with participating manufacturing sites is valued as business best practice.
•	Launched Intranet based knowledge sharing program to boost RFT improvement
•	Contributed strongly to leading RFT improvement results (SMU VR)
•	Created Measure System Analysis (MSA) awareness.
